value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. At that time, we are using Date() function and Time() function. Now, there's one more easy way to compare Date and Time value in Power BI which is using "dt" keyword before

value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report

value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard
value.excerpt: In this video, I show how you can configure Reporting Services to integrate with Power BI and then pin visualizations from a paginated report to a Power BI dashboard.   There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook

value.title: A Power Query feature you may not know about!
value.excerpt: We thought everyone knew about this Power Query capability! At the Power Platform Conference, we found that many did not. Well, we want to help make sure everyone is aware so that you can reuse your awesome Power Query work in Power BI or Excel!  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Another Power BI optimization tool - Report Analyzer
value.excerpt: Already optimized your data model and still having some performance issues in Power BI? Check out Michael Kovalsky's Report Analyzer tool to inspect your report.   Michael Kovalsky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelkovalsky/  Michael Kovalsky's blog: https://www.elegantbi.com/  Report Analyzer https://www.elegantbi.com/post/reportanalyzer

value.title: Answering your datamart questions
value.excerpt: You've got a LOT of questions about datamarts in Power BI! Adam answers a few that we've seen popping up. Giving his thoughts on these questions.  Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview#comparing-dataflows-to-datamarts
